description:
The first episode in a new BASICS series that will cover all the very simple things you need to start building terrain for your tabletop games like D&D. This episode I show you the various types of acrylic craft paints used in terrain building, and what colours are most important when starting out, and how to build on your colour palette as you progress in your new hobby.

Craftsmart Paint: http://amzn.to/2mzhqHb
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

title: Basics: What paint do you need to start building terrain for D&D? (Black Magic Craft Episode 023)
